程序包 android.car.hardware

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    CarMixManager.CarMixEventCallback  
    CarSensorManager.OnSensorChangedListener
    Listener for car sensor data change.
    CarVendorExtensionManager.CarVendorExtensionCallback
    Contains callback functions that will be called when some event happens with vehicle property.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    CarHvacFanDirection
    CarHvacFanDirection is an abstraction for car's fan directions.
    CarMixManager
    CarMixManager可以使用其他任意Manager中定义的ID
    部分APP在使用不同的ID时,需要同时创建多个Manager,比较混乱,在使用ID不多,但是ID又比较分散的情况下,可以选择使用此Manager
    接口的使用方式,和其他Manager的方法类似,ID的使用参考各个Manager里对应的定义
    CarPropertyConfig<T>
    Represents general information about car property such as data type and min/max ranges for car areas (if applicable).
    CarPropertyConfig.AreaConfig<T> 已过时
    This API is deprecated in favor of AreaIdConfig which allows properties to specify which enum values are supported.
    CarPropertyConfig.Builder<T>  
    CarPropertyValue<T>
    Stores a value for a vehicle property ID and area ID combination.
    CarPropertyYesNo  
    CarSensorConfig
    A CarSensorConfig object corresponds to a single sensor type coming from the car.
    CarSensorEvent
    A CarSensorEvent object corresponds to a single sensor event coming from the car.
